# GraphicalLasso.jl

[Link to GitHub](https://github.com/ivanuricardo/GraphicalLasso.jl)

This package provides efficient tools for generating sparse covariance matrices, estimating sparse precision matrices using the graphical lasso (glasso) algorithm (Friedman, Hastie, and Tibshirani 2008; Meinshausen and BÃ¼hlmann 2006), and selecting optimal regularization parameters.
